Festus Keyamo communications director for Bola Tinubu's presidential campaign said the ruling party's candidate had won comfortably – having secured a plurality of votes and 25% of the votes in two-thirds of the 36 states – according to results submitted to the the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC)...

Buhari recruited prominent human rights activist and lawyer Festus Keyamo as his director of strategic communications for the election campaign which will help his image among the urban middle-classes who want more accountability and raise expectations of what Buhari's anti-corruption strategy could achieve during a second term...

His choice of Festus Keyamo who styles himself as a top anti-corruption prosecutor suggests that Buhari wants to maximise his image as a leader of integrity compared to his free-spending counterparts across the political spectrum...
